title: Night and day
creator_credit: Michael Curtiz, Arthur Schwartz and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: The spectacular musical biography of one of this century’s greatest composers - Cole Porter. Cary Grant portrays Cole Porter and Night and Day shows the popular songwriter’s amazing life story - from studying law at Yale, his bravery in World War I, his romance with Linda Lee to his first Broadway success. Features the evergreen hit songs “Begin the Beguine”, “I Get a Kick Out of You”, “My Heart Belongs to Daddy” and “Let’s fall in love.” Starring Cary Grant and Alexis Smith. Co-starring Monty Woolley, Ginny Simms, Jane Wyman and Mary Martin.
